title: Longest Substring with K Distinct Characters
description: Given a string, find the length of the longest substring in it with no more than K distinct characters.

examples.explanation: The longest substring with no more than '2' distinct characters is "araa".
The longest substring with no more than '1' distinct character is "aa".
The longest substrings with no more than '3' distinct characters are "cbbeb" & "bbebi".
The longest substring with no more than '2' distinct characters is "accc".

s.description: The input string consisting of lowercase English letters.

K.description: The maximum number of distinct characters allowed in the substring.

output.description: The length of the longest substring with no more than K distinct characters.
